attributes.action: Allow pets to travel via boat or plane during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: For the simple reason many of us have purchased a animal and we are not able to take custody of it.
attributes.background: We would like you to enable pets to travel via boat or plane between the UK And Channel Islands during Covid19 lockdown.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Any remaining restrictions on animals entering the Channel Islands would be a matter for the Government of the island concerned.

You can petition the States of Jersey directly: https://petitions.gov.je/
